content:
# Learning Module Template

**1. Introduction & Context:**
Provide an overview of the topic and why it matters.

**2. Core Concepts:**
Explain the fundamental concepts and principles.

**3. Practical Applications:**
Show how the concepts are applied in real-world scenarios.

**4. Hands-on Exercise:**
Include interactive elements for practical learning.

**5. Responsible AI & Sustainability in Practice:**
Address ethical considerations and sustainability aspects.

**6. Further Resources:**
Provide additional reading and learning materials.
